tit.e: Biwako-onsen Hot Spring (a hot spring near Biwako [Lake Biwa])
Biwako-onsen Hot Spring (a hot spring near Biwako [Lake Biwa])
Biwako-onsen Hot Spring (a hot spring near Biwako [Lake Biwa])

sen.j: びわ湖温泉（びわこおんせん）は、滋賀県大津市茶が崎にある温泉。
sen.e: The term "Biwako-onsen Hot Spring" refers to a hot spring located at Chagasaki, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
The term "Biwako-onsen Hot Spring" refers to a hot spring located at Chagasaki, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
The term "Biwako-onsen Hot Spring" refers to a hot spring located at Chagasaki, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 茶が崎温泉とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is also called Chagasaki-onsen Hot Spring.
It is also called Chagasaki-onsen Hot Spring.
It is also called Chagasaki-onsen Hot Spring.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道湖西線大津京駅より徒歩約7分。
sen.e: It is a seven-minute walk away from Otsukyo Station on the Kosei Line of the West Japan Railway Company.
Seven minutes on foot from Otsukyo Station on the Kosei Line of the West Japan Railway Company.
sen.cmt: It is a seven-minute walk away → Seven minutes on foot
sen.e: Seven minutes on foot from Otsukyo Station on the Kosei Line of the West Japan Railway Company.

sen.j: 京阪電気鉄道京阪石山坂本線皇子山駅より徒歩約7分
sen.e: It is a seven-minute walk away from Ojiyama Station on the Keihan Ishiyama Sakamoto Line of the Keihan Electric Railway Co., Ltd.
sen.cmt: 「京阪石山坂本線」として「Keihan Ishiyama-sakamoto Main Line」という訳語も登録されていますが、「Main」抜きの訳語のほうを採用し、用語統一リストに従い、ハイフンなしで表記しました。「京阪電気鉄道」は会社HPの表記と同じものを採用しました。
sen.e: Seven minutes on foot from Ojiyama Station on the Keihan Ishiyama Sakamoto Line of the Keihan Electric Railway Co., Ltd.
sen.cmt: It is a seven-minute walk away → Seven minutes on foot
sen.e: Seven minutes on foot from Ojiyama Station on the Keihan Ishiyama Sakamoto Line of the Keihan Electric Railway Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 名神高速道路大津インターチェンジから約15分。
sen.e: It takes about fifteen minutes to drive from Otsu Interchange of Meishin Expressway to it in a car.
About fifteen minutes drive from Otsu Interchange of Meishin Expressway.
About fifteen minutes drive from Otsu Interchange of Meishin Expressway.

sen.j: アルカリ性単純温泉
sen.e: It is an alkaline simple hot spring.
Alkaline simple hot spring.
sen.cmt: It is aを削除しました。
sen.e: Alkaline simple hot spring.

sen.j: 源泉温度34.3℃
sen.e: The spring source temperature is 34.3℃.
The spring source temperature is 34.3℃.
The spring source temperature is 34.3℃.

tit.cmt: 英辞郎 on the Webに、「温泉の効能」に対して「benefits of hot springs」という訳語を採用しました。

sen.j: 神経痛、リウマチ、創傷、筋肉痛、関節痛
sen.e: It is supposedly good for curing neuralgia, rheumatism, wounds, myalgia and arthralgia.
It is supposedly good for curing neuralgia, rheumatism, wounds, myalgia and arthralgia.
It is supposedly good for curing neuralgia, rheumatism, wounds, myalgia and arthralgia.

tit.j: 旅亭 紅葉 （旧 ホテル紅葉）
tit.cmt: ホテル紅葉: 定訳不明

sen.j: 和式の内装を誇る「旅亭 紅葉」（1993年10月開業）が営業している。
sen.e: A hotel named 'Ryotei Koyo,' the big appeal of which is the Japanese interior design, has opened for business since October 1993.
A hotel named 'Ryotei Koyo,' the big appeal of which is the Japanese interior design, has opened for business since October 1993.
A hotel named 'Ryotei Koyo,' the big appeal of which is the Japanese interior design, has opened for business since October 1993.

sen.j: ホテル紅葉（後述）をリニューアルオープンしたもの。
sen.e: After Hotel Koyo (see below for further details) had been renovated, it reopened as Ryotei Koyo.
Hotel Koyo (see below for further details) was renovated to reopen as Ryotei Koyo.
Hotel Koyo (see below for further details) was renovated to reopen as Ryotei Koyo.

sen.j: 京都市に本部を置くジャパンレジャーサービスグループの子会社「琵琶湖リゾートホテル株式会社」が経営している。
sen.e: It has been run by 'Biwako Resort Hotel K. K.,' which is a subsidiary company of Japan Leisure Service Group Co., Ltd. having its headquarters in Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: ジャパンレジャーサービスグループ、琵琶湖リゾートホテル株式会社: 定訳は不明ですが、「http://www.alacrastore.com/storecontent/dnb2/716733324」(ジャパンレジャーサービスグループ)「http://www.alacrastore.com/storecontent/dnb2/697679561」(琵琶湖リゾートホテル)の表記を採用しています。
sen.e: It is run by 'Biwako Resort Hotel K. K.,' a subsidiary company of Japan Leisure Service Group Co., Ltd. based in Kyoto City.
It is run by 'Biwako Resort Hotel K. K.,' a subsidiary company of Japan Leisure Service Group Co., Ltd. based in Kyoto City.

sen.j: びわ湖に面した露天風呂が好評である。
sen.e: An open-air bath facing toward Lake Biwa enjoys popularity.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: An open-air bath facing toward Lake Biwa enjoys popularity.
An open-air bath facing toward Lake Biwa enjoys popularity.

sen.j: 2007年9月14日にびわ湖に面したレストラン『湖彩・湖眺』がオープン。
sen.e: Two restaurants named "Kosai" (literally, "lake's coloration") and "Kocho" (literally, "lake view") that face toward Lake Biwa opened on September 14, 2007.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/湖彩・湖眺: 2つの異なるレストラン(http://www.ryotei-koyo.jp/dish/)なので、そのように訳しています。
sen.e: Two restaurants named "Kosai" (literally, "lake's coloration") and "Kocho" (literally, "lake view") that face toward Lake Biwa opened on September 14, 2007.
Two restaurants named "Kosai" (literally, "lake's coloration") and "Kocho" (literally, "lake view") that face toward Lake Biwa opened on September 14, 2007.

sen.j: 宿泊客の送迎には「牛車タイプの送迎車」（前部に牛頭をあしらったマイクロバス）を使用している。
sen.e: Courtesy cars modeled after ox-drawn carriages,' which are microbuses with a painting of a head of an ox on the front part, are used to pick up guests.
sen.cmt: 牛車タイプの送迎車: 定訳不明
sen.e: Courtesy cars modeled after ox-drawn carriages,' a microbus with a painting of the head of an ox on the front part, is used to pick up guests.
sen.cmt: 簡潔にしました。また単数形でいいように思います。
sen.e: Courtesy cars modeled after ox-drawn carriages,' a microbus with a painting of the head of an ox on the front part, is used to pick up guests.

sen.j: ホテル紅葉
sen.e: Hotel Koyo
Hotel Koyo
Hotel Koyo

sen.j: びわ湖温泉はかつて、ホテル紅葉（1964年開業）を中心とするレジャーランドとして有名であった。
sen.e: Biwako-onsen Hot Spring was formerly famous as a leisure complex in which Hotel Koyo (year of opening: 1964) played a central role.
Biwako-onsen Hot Spring was formerly famous as a leisure complex in which Hotel Koyo (year of opening: 1964) played a central role.
Biwako-onsen Hot Spring was formerly famous as a leisure complex in which Hotel Koyo (year of opening: 1964) played a central role.

sen.j: 周辺には遊園地のびわ湖温泉紅葉パラダイスが隣接していた。
sen.e: In its vicinity, an amusement park named Biwako Onsen Koyo Paradise was adjacent to it.
sen.cmt: 指示書に記載の「。」で区切られてしまっている抽出時の問題のケースなので、()外の文章を一文にし、その後の()内の文章を分割、一文となるように()をつけました。/びわ湖温泉紅葉パラダイス: 定訳不明
sen.e: In its vicinity, an amusement park named Biwako Onsen Koyo Paradise was adjacent to it.
In its vicinity, an amusement park named Biwako Onsen Koyo Paradise was adjacent to it.

sen.j: （1966年に紅葉パラダイスとして開業。)
sen.e: (The amusement park opened as Koyo Paradise in 1966.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: (The amusement park opened as Koyo Paradise in 1966.)
(The amusement park opened as Koyo Paradise in 1966.)

sen.j: (のちに「びわ湖パラダイス」に変更、1998年12月廃業。)
sen.e: (Later its name was changed to 'Biwako Paradise,' but it closed down in December 1998.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: (Later its name was changed to 'Biwako Paradise,' but it closed down in December 1998.)
(Later its name was changed to 'Biwako Paradise,' but it closed down in December 1998.)

sen.j: (以下紅葉パラダイス）
sen.e: (It is called Koyo Paradise hereinafter.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: (It is called Koyo Paradise hereinafter.)
(It is called Koyo Paradise hereinafter.)

sen.j: ホテル紅葉の演歌調テレビCM（歌手：玉井京子）は、近畿地方に当時在住していた世代の間では今なお語り草となっている。
sen.e: Generations that resided in Kinki region at that time still talk about the TV commercial of Hotel Koyo with an enka (Japanese ballad) style theme song sung by a singer Kyoko TAMAI.
sen.cmt: 演歌調テレビCM: 定訳不明。用語集の訳語に「演歌」の説明を足しています。/玉井京子: 用語集の訳語を、指示書に合わせた表記に直しています。
sen.e: Generations that resided in Kinki region at that time still talk about the TV commercial of Hotel Koyo with an enka (Japanese ballad) style theme song sung by a singer Kyoko TAMAI.
Generations that resided in Kinki region at that time still talk about the TV commercial of Hotel Koyo with an enka (Japanese ballad) style theme song sung by a singer Kyoko TAMAI.

sen.j: 紅葉パラダイスのCMもまたお馴染みであった。
sen.e: The commercial message of Koyo Paradise was also well-known.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The commercial message of Koyo Paradise was also well-known.
The commercial message of Koyo Paradise was also well-known.

sen.j: （ホテル紅葉のCMはほぼ全国で放送されていた。)
sen.e: (The commercial message of Hotel Koyo was broadcast almost everywhere in the country.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処(文末にカッコを補いました)
sen.e: (The commercial message of Hotel Koyo was broadcast almost everywhere in the country.)
(The commercial message of Hotel Koyo was broadcast almost everywhere in the country.)

sen.j: (特にテレビ朝日系列の土曜日夕方〔ビッグスポーツの時〕は必ず放送されていた）。
sen.e: (Especially, it was always broadcast by the affiliates of TV Asahi Corporation on Saturday evening when they televised a big sport.)
sen.cmt: 原文では、この後列に「)。」が入っていましたが本列の最後にコピー&ペーストし、後列は削除し、文頭にカッコを補いました。/系列: 「テレビ朝日系」として「TV Asahi Corporation Network」という訳語が登録されていますが、Google検索でヒットしないため、英辞郎 on the Webに「加盟系列局」の訳語として掲載されている「affiliate」を使用しています。
sen.e: (Especially, it was always broadcast by the affiliates of TV Asahi Corporation on Saturday evening when they televised a big sport.)
(Especially, it was always broadcast by the affiliates of TV Asahi Corporation on Saturday evening when they televised a big sport.)

sen.j: 併設の紅葉パラダイスは1978年、ドイツ製蒸気機関車と国際寝台車会社製寝台車 (鉄道)8両を連ねた「ホテル・オリエント急行」を敷地内に開業した。
sen.e: In 1978, Koyo Paradise adjacent to Hotel Koyo opened 'Hotel Orient Express,' which was a nine-car train consisting of a steam locomotive made in Germany and eight sleeping railroad cars made by an international sleeping car manufacturer, on its property.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/寝台車会社、ホテル・オリエント急行: 定訳不明
sen.e: In 1978, Koyo Paradise adjacent to Hotel Koyo opened 'Hotel Orient Express,' which was a nine-car train consisting of a steam locomotive made in Germany and eight sleeping railroad cars made by International Sleeping-Car Company, on its property.
sen.cmt: an international sleeping car manufacturer → International Sleeping-Car Company
sen.e: In 1978, Koyo Paradise adjacent to Hotel Koyo opened 'Hotel Orient Express,' which was a nine-car train consisting of a steam locomotive made in Germany and eight sleeping railroad cars made by International Sleeping-Car Company, on its property.

sen.j: 話題となった。
sen.e: It became a topic of conversation at that time.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It became a topic of conversation at that time.
It became a topic of conversation at that time.

sen.j: だが、廃業に伴いこれら客車も解体されてしまった（SLホテルも参照）。
sen.e: But these sleeping cars were dismantled due to the closing down (also refer to the section on Steam Locomotive Hotel).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: But these sleeping cars were dismantled due to the closing down (also refer to the section on Steam Locomotive Hotel).
But these sleeping cars were dismantled due to the closing down (also refer to the section on Steam Locomotive Hotel).

sen.j: 上記の紅葉パラダイス、旅亭 紅葉のかつての運営主体の丸玉観光株式会社（京都市）はホテル改装と遊園地の不振などによる負債を抱えていた。
sen.e: Marutama Kanko in Kyoto City, the former operating company of the above-mentioned Koyo Paradise and Ryotei Koyo, was in debt due to the renovation of the hotel, the business depression of the amusement park, etc.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/運営主体: 定訳は不明ですが、用語集の訳語は、サイト「http://financial-dictionary.thefreedictionary.com/Operating+Unit」の説明によれば、この文脈に合わないため、別の訳語を充てています。
sen.e: Marutama Kanko in Kyoto City, the former operating company of the above-mentioned Koyo Paradise and Ryotei Koyo, was in debt due to the renovation of the hotel, the business depression of the amusement park, etc.

Marutama Kanko in Kyoto City, the former operating company of the above-mentioned Koyo Paradise and Ryotei Koyo, was in debt due to the renovation of the hotel, the business depression of the amusement park, etc.

sen.j: 2006年3月1日に倒産。
sen.e: The company became bankrupt on March 1, 2006.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The company became bankrupt on March 1, 2006.
The company became bankrupt on March 1, 2006.

sen.j: 旅亭 紅葉は倒産に先立って、ジャパンレジャーサービスグループ（略称：JLS／京都市）へ売却した。
sen.e: Ryotei Koyo had been sold to Japan Leisure Service Group Co., Ltd. in Kyoto City, which is abbreviated to JLS, before the bankruptcy.
Ryotei Koyo had been sold to Japan Leisure Service Group Co., Ltd. in Kyoto City, which is abbreviated to JLS, before the bankruptcy.
Ryotei Koyo had been sold to Japan Leisure Service Group Co., Ltd. in Kyoto City, which is abbreviated to JLS, before the bankruptcy.

sen.j: なお、旅亭 紅葉に隣接して、ホテル紅葉と丸玉観光の創業者の木下彌三郎が収集したギリシャ・ローマ彫刻、日本画、洋画などを展示している木下美術館がある。
sen.e: Pieces such as sculpture from Greece and Rome, Japanese-style paintings and western paintings collected by Yasaburo KINOSHITA, the founder of Hotel Koyo and Marutama Kanko, were on display at Kinoshita Museum of Art adjacent to Ryotei Koyo.
sen.cmt: ギリシャ・ローマ彫刻: 定訳不明/展示している: 原文は現在形ですが、現在、この美術館は休館中なので、過去形で訳しています。
sen.e: Pieces such as sculpture from Greece and Rome, Japanese-style paintings and western paintings collected by Yasaburo KINOSHITA, the founder of Hotel Koyo and Marutama Kanko, were on display at Kinoshita Museum of Art adjacent to Ryotei Koyo.

Pieces such as sculpture from Greece and Rome, Japanese-style paintings and western paintings collected by Yasaburo KINOSHITA, the founder of Hotel Koyo and Marutama Kanko, were on display at Kinoshita Museum of Art adjacent to Ryotei Koyo.

sen.j: 倒産後も存続していたが、現在、移転準備中のため休館中。
sen.e: Although the museum continued to exist even after the bankruptcy, it is now closed due to preparations for a removal.
Although the museum continued to exist even after the bankruptcy, it is now closed due to preparations for a removal.
Although the museum continued to exist even after the bankruptcy, it is now closed due to preparations for a removal.

sen.j: 一方、紅葉パラダイスの跡地にはマンションが建った。
sen.e: On the other hand, a condominium has been built at the site of the demolished Koyo Paradise.
On the other hand, a condominium has been built at the site of the demolished Koyo Paradise.
On the other hand, a condominium has been built at the site of the demolished Koyo Paradise.
